title: Linear Programming
description: A study of linear programming problems, including the simplex method, duality, and sensitivity analysis with applications to matrix games, interger programming, and networks.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (MATH 15X2 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MATH 1522 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
